title: Export Thunderbird All Address Book
content: I am wanting to export my Thunderbird file All Address Book but there is no facility to do this. I can export my lists just fine. Christine
creator: christinerothwell

title: Trying to install Thunderbird calendar
content: I'm trying to get the calendar app working in a new Thunderbird installation. Here are my notes on what I tried: https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/lightning-calendar-tabs/versions/ Download lightning_calendar_tabs-3.8-tb.xpi (latest version) to C:\Users\ken\Downloads In Thunderbird: Tools --> Add-ons --> Gear icon --> Install add-on from file --> C:\Users\ken\Downloads --> lightning_calendar_tabs-3.8-tb.xpi "about:addons Lightning Calendar Tabs could not be installed because it is not compatible with Thunderbird 144.0.1." Any suggestions?
creator: kjinnovation

title: Tarvitaanko sähköpstille Open Works Licensia?
content: Thunderbird lakkasi yllättäen hakemasta sähköpostia Outlookista. Tuli vain ilmoitus, ettei ole voimassa olevaa OWL lisenssiä. Tarvitaanko sellainen?
creator: aulis.niemi

title: Outlook mail account toevoegen in thunderbird.
content:
Ik probeer mijn Outlook.com mail adres toe te voegen in Thunderbird. Maar ik krijg steeds fout meldingen. Ik doe de volgende instellingen: server Imap-mail.outlook.com 993 SSL/SST. ik krijg steeds de melding Server fout. bIj andere E_mails programma's zoals G-mail werkt dit correct. Ik heb ook al QAUTH2.0 geprobeerd maar dan melding dat dit niet ondersteund wordt. Weten jullie wat ik fout die?

Mvg,

Lieven
creator: l.deduffeleer

title: Lenta visualizzazione delle mail
content:
Buongiorno

Da sabato 18 ottobre il client ci mette un minuto buono per visualizzare le mail provenienti da account IMAP di gmail. Non sono state installate nuove estensioni e il client è aggiornato all'ultima versione 140.4.0esr

Quale può essere il problema? Grazie
creator: sasgescon

title: Cloudflare authentication is not working
content: Dear Sirs, trying to find some extentions to be able to install an email account of Microsoft exchange, as ExQuilla I was using is not working anymore, I tried to search for alternatives, but I am not able to access the extensions database, because here https://addons.thunderbird.net/it/thunderbird/search/?q=exchange&appver=144.0&platform=Linux I am not able to go forward, as after a little while the verification is restarting, not allowing to access the database. Can you please help me with some solutions? Thank you
creator: s.pellegrini

title: Je ne reçois pas les mails de Brevo
content:
Bonjour,

Je suis professionnelle et j'ai crée une adresse mail avec mon nom de domaine: contact@terraito.fr Je souhaite créer un compte sur Brevo pour mettre en place une newsletter mais quand je créée mon compte sur Brevo je suis censée recevoir un mail pour valider mon adresse mail et finaliser la création de mon compte sur Brevo. Après avoir essayé plusieurs fois je ne reçois pas ces mails. J'ai contacté le service client de Brevo et le problème ne vient pas de chez eux car pour eux les mails sont bien partis. Il n'y a rien également dans les spams.

Merci infiniment pour votre aide, Marie CHEVALIER
creator: contact1204

title: adress in message i will send
creator: altokatlidis

title: Thunderbird 144 will not run
content: Following a Windows update last week, Thunderbird says to complete an update, a Reboot is required but the reboot achieves nothing and the same dialog box message appears.
creator: andy.pedrick

title: Reading Pain in Chinese
content:
I get messages sent to my e-mail from groups.io.

In groups.io the messages are in english, I have also seen the same messages received on Outlook and the test is in English from a UKJ source so no need to be in Chinese, but when the e-mails are sent to my Thunderbird client they are in Chinese.

It also affects e-mails from PayPal and eBay as well.

How do I change this?

Kind Regards

James
creator: bscdhvbnjc
